title: Self-Serving Bias in Success
statement: We credit ourselves for success but blame others for failure.
explanation: This bias helps protect our self-esteem, making us feel good about our achievements while avoiding personal responsibility for setbacks.
real_example: After getting a promotion, you think your hard work paid off, but if you miss a deadline, you blame team issues.
application: Try this: Reflect on a recent failure and identify your role in it to improve growth and accountability.
